alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County; Orange; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 5:07PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Lake and northwestern Orange Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 506 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Clermont, or near Groveland, moving southeast at 10 to 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Apopka, Winter Garden, Eustis, Tavares and Mount Dora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or hard-topped vehicle. Remember, when thunder roars, go indoors!

area.areaDesc: Northern Lake County; Orange; Southern Lake County
